channel.title: Rune-Spice 317 (500+ Content, Many bosses and mini games Loads of content)
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://rune-spice.com/public/style_images/1_logo.png[/img][/center]
[u]Links[/u]
[url=http://rune-spice.com]Home[/url] [url=http://rune-spice.com/index.php?/index]Forums[/url] [url=http://rune-spice.com/webclient/index.html]Webclient[/url]
General Information Elevation's community is developed by four dedicated members who look to create a stable website, and a strong economic server. Elevation's economy is based off of a strong skilling community that we hope to create by having a universal skilling system. We have five strong bosses for our mains and pures to earn the strongest items in the Elevation community. We are continuing to add more and more challenging bosses for our players to face. We also have 5 minigames so far that a full developed and ready for our community to use!
Features Custom never before seen home! 23 Functional Skills including summoning and a custom dungeoneering 5 Boss Locations (Godwars, Tormented Demons, Daggonoths, Corporel Beast, and Jad) 5 Minigames (Duel Arena, Barrows, Pest Control, Fight Pits and Party Room) A server built for a strong economy Many Player vs Player Locations 4 Dungeons for players to train and slay Full Slayer system with rewards Invasion Power Board community Webclient Npc and Player clipping Strong economic shops to make it more player drivin Universal skilling
Future Updates Hiscores More bosses A client with a 377 gameframe for a old school feel (optional) Much More
[img]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn295/deven_053/Fishing.png[/img] [img]http://i307.photobucket.com/albums/nn295/deven_053/Untitled-1.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/1.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/2.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/3.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/4.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/5.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/6.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/7.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/8.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/9.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/10.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/11.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/12.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/13.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/14.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/15.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/16.png[/img] [img]http://rune-spice.com/pics/17.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Rune-Spice 317 (500+ Content, Many bosses and mini games Loads of content)
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

[center][center][/center]

Links

Home
Forums
Webclient

General Information
Elevation’s community is developed by four dedicated members who look to create a stable website, and a strong economic server. Elevation’s economy is based off of a strong skilling community that we hope to create by having a universal skilling system. We have five strong bosses for our mains and pures to earn the strongest items in the Elevation community. We are continuing to add more and more challenging bosses for our players to face. We also have 5 minigames so far that a full developed and ready for our community to use!

Features
Custom never before seen home!
23 Functional Skills including summoning and a custom dungeoneering
5 Boss Locations (Godwars, Tormented Demons, Daggonoths, Corporel Beast, and Jad)
5 Minigames (Duel Arena, Barrows, Pest Control, Fight Pits and Party Room)
A server built for a strong economy
Many Player vs Player Locations
4 Dungeons for players to train and slay
Full Slayer system with rewards
Invasion Power Board community
Webclient
Npc and Player clipping
Strong economic shops to make it more player drivin
Universal skilling

Future Updates
Hiscores
More bosses
A client with a 377 gameframe for a old school feel (optional)
Much More



















[/center]

Read full topic
